segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so at peace in her little world of washing dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is overflowing, cascading over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wonder if she even notices what is happening at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows larger, and I feel a twinge of anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between her calm demeanor and the chaos around her is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so tranquil, almost mocking this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
